description:
11.63 deflicker
Remove temporal frame luminance variations.

It accepts the following options:
name: deflicker

options.description: Set moving-average filter size in frames. Default is 5. Allowed range is 2 - 129.
options.name: size

options.description:
Set averaging mode to smooth temporal luminance variations.

Available values are:

‘am’

Arithmetic mean

‘gm’

Geometric mean

‘hm’

Harmonic mean

‘qm’

Quadratic mean

‘cm’

Cubic mean

‘pm’

Power mean

‘median’

Median
options.name: mode

options.description: Do not actually modify frame. Useful when one only wants metadata.
options.name: bypass
